long_prompt: A single tall, golden sunflower stands prominently in the center of a small garden bed, surrounded by a lush bed of daisies.
A tall, sturdy sunflower with a large yellow bloom stands proudly in a sunny field, its stem adorned with a few green leaves.
A bright yellow sunflower stands tall in a sunny garden, its large yellow petals radiating outward like a beacon of joy.
negative_long_prompt: Two sunflowers, one tall and golden, the other shorter and slightly tilted, bloom in unison in a garden bed, their vibrant petals a striking contrast against the soft green leaves.

Two tall sunflowers stand side by side in a vibrant garden, their large yellow petals spreading outwards like twin beacons of happiness.
